about_the_game:
Memory awakens inside the data of a game, fully conscious. She walks through a fictional version of Tokyo searching for clues to the whereabouts of "him."
She meets and gathers information from the quirky residents of Tokyo, including her best friend Messiah, her classmate who works at the arcade Cult, and the mysterious lone elementary student Lime.
Memory's choices will influence the direction of the story, and terrifyingly unexpected events may also occur…
Beautiful graphics and memorable music will immerse you in the mystery and horror of this game.

In this world full of emotion, terrifying and unpredictable
twists and turns await you.

Come along and see Memory's story through to the end…



"The chapter… is replaying again…"
VA: Koyori Nohana
She's a second-year student at High School A, located near Shibuya. In terms of personality, she's quiet and gentle.
She apparently used to have a sharp and focused mind, but something happened to turn her forgetful and sloppy.
She's been friends with Messiah since they were young, and they often hang out together after school.
While she's not the most proactive when it comes to making friends, whether it's because she has strong social skills or just because she's so easygoing, she gets along with most people easily.
She can also be a bit odd, resulting in Messiah often struggling to keep up with her.


VA: Emoko
Because she's so kind, she frequently hides her true feelings out of consideration for others.
She loves cute, trendy things and checks online daily to stay on top of things.
Before high school, she was a plain, ordinary girl who wore long skirts and kept her hair naturally black. She was obsessed with anime and manga, but upon discovering a stylish and inspiring internet idol. That motivated her to study fashion, and she made her high school debut as you see her now.


VA: Takamine Nitto
After school, he puts on piercings, glasses, and a maid uniform, which he even wears at his job at the arcade. No one really knows why he walks around in this strange outfit.He's close friends with Michiaki, and the two are constantly together while at school.
He doesn't often join in on his friends' antics, but he does get a kick out of watching from the sidelines.

Recently he's become more concerned for Memory and starts talking to her at school without anyone knowing.
This is because seeing her act so disheartened after losing someone important to her has made him worry about how her condition might worsen in the future, and he feels obligated to reach out to help if incase she breaks down completely.
His real name is Kato Ruto.


VA: Sano Yuri
He has a variety of hobbies including video games, manga, sports, and watching movies.
Recently he's gotten into digging up obscure B movies at rental video shops.
He and Cult are good friends and constant companions.
But ever since Cult started talking to Memory, he's had the sense that something terrible would happen, so he drops by Cult's job every day to keep an eye on him.
He might seem like a stalker, but he does it out of sincere concern.


VA: Aisaka Narumi
She seems to be unaware of her own charisma.
Because of her easy, peaceful, drama-free life, she has a fondness for gossip and crazy stories.
She especially loves stories about the darker side of humanity (all the better if they're nonfiction).


VA: Yayoi Yoi (Vtuber)
He seems to be waiting for his mom to come pick him up after school.


VA: Edo
He likes to care for others, so whenever Memory, one of his regulars, pops in, he lets her have a meal or dessert, on the house.
He follows trends closely and is into beauty and makeup. On his days off, he seems to keep up with Korean idols.
Not much is known about his background, but he has a lot of life experience. He's also bisexual and has over 100 previous partners.
He seems to have a long-distance boyfriend right now, but no one is sure.


VA: Baru
He seems somewhat suspicious at first glance but turns out he's quite friendly, kind, and chill.
Due to his constant efforts, the zine is gaining fans at a steady rate, and dreams of turning it into a nationwide phenomenon.
He loves ghost stories, science fiction, horror, and other dark topics, often scouring the internet for new tales and concepts.


VA: Uchimura Yotaro
He appears to be interested in Memory, but any attempts to confirm this result in him dodging the question with jokes.


  • An emotional story
  • High-quality voice acting
  • Warm and stylish graphics
  • A collab between Room97 and the creator as the theme song

*cream△ is the licensor of this game. For inquiries about the product, please contact Champloo Games.
